nodes.text: A battle was fought during the Mandalorian Wars on Nouane, capital world of the eponymous mini-empire Nouane. In 3963 BBY, the Mandalorians launched a Coreward assault from Mandalorian space into the Galactic Republic. After taking the planet Serroco, the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders proceeded along their invasion corridor to Nouane and conquered the world; as a result, representatives of the beleaguered planet turned to the Republic for assistance. After taking Nouane, the Mandalorians proceeded to a victory at Dagary Minor before their advance was haulted following a battle on the planet of Omonoth. Eventually the Mandalorians were driven off the planet of Nouane, and the government joined the Republic as a semi-autonomous Allied Region.

In the keynote address at the four-hundred-twelfth Proceedings of Galactic Anthropology and History, in 24 ABY, Vilnau Teupt spoke of the Mandalorian race's development, mentioning the capture of Nouane while talking through the Mandalorian Wars.

The battle was mentioned in The Essential Atlas, a book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace that was released in 2009. It was later referenced in an in-universe speech recorded within 2012's The Essential Guide to Warfare.
